package.name: us-time-zones
package.author: Jon Ouellette
package.description: A simple package for printing converted time.
package.title: US Time Zones

manifest.name: us-time-zones
manifest.title: US Time Zones
manifest.description: A simple package for printing converted time.
manifest.author: Jon Ouellette

value.readme:
# US Time Zones

This package converts current time to US time zones.

## Installation

```
espanso install us-time-zones
```

## Usage

The triggers are based on timezone and hour-format desired. Daylight savings is based system timezone and is printed with output. 

#### Examples

`:et12` for Eastern Time, 12-Hour format. 

`:pt24` for Pacific Time, 24-Hour format.



### Eastern Time

**America/New_York - Eastern Standard Time (EST) / Eastern Daylight Time (EDT)**

|  Trigger  | Replacement |
|-----------|---------|
| `:et12`   | 04:31:28 PM EDT |
| `:et24`   | 16:33:51 EDT |

---

### Central Time

**America/Chicago - Central Standard Time (CST) / Central Daylight Time (CDT)**

|  Trigger  | Replacement |
|-----------|---------|
| `:ct12`   | 03:35:13 PM CDT |
| `:ct24`   | 15:35:21 CDT |

---

### Mountain Time

**America/Denver - Mountain Standard Time (MST) / Mountain Daylight Time (MDT)**

|  Trigger  | Replacement |
|-----------|---------|
| `:mt12`   | 02:36:28 PM MDT |
| `:mt24`   | 14:36:35 MDT |

---

### Pacific Time

**America/Los_Angeles - Pacific Standard Time (PST) / Pacific Daylight Time (PDT)**

|  Trigger  | Replacement |
|-----------|---------|
| `:pt12`   | 01:37:54 PM PDT |
| `:pt24`   | 13:38:02 PDT |

---

### Alaska Time

**America/Anchorage - Alaska Standard Time (AKST) / Alaska Daylight Time (AKDT)**

|  Trigger  | Replacement |
|-----------|---------|
| `:at12`   | 12:39:02 PM AKDT |
| `:at24`   | 12:39:09 AKDT |

---

### Hawaii-Aleutian Time

**America/Adak - Hawaii-Aleutian Standard Time (HAST) / Hawaii-Aleutian Daylight Time (HADT)**

|  Trigger  | Replacement |
|-----------|---------|
| `:hat12`   | 11:42:09 AM HDT |
| `:hat24`   | 11:41:25 HDT |

---

packageYml.name: package.yml
packageYml.content:
matches:
  # 12-HOUR FORMAT ##########################################
    # Eastern Time
  - trigger: ":et12"
    replace: "{{et12}}"
    vars:
      - name: et12
        type: shell
        params:
          cmd: TZ='America/New_York' date "+%I:%M:%S %p %Z"
   # Central Time
  - trigger: ":ct12"
    replace: "{{ct12}}"
    vars:
      - name: ct12
        type: shell
        params:
          cmd: TZ='America/Chicago' date "+%I:%M:%S %p %Z" 
  # Mountain Time
  - trigger: ":mt12"
    replace: "{{mt12}}"
    vars:
      - name: mt12
        type: shell
        params:
          cmd: TZ='America/Denver' date "+%I:%M:%S %p %Z"
  # Pacific Time
  - trigger: ":pt12"
    replace: "{{pt12}}"
    vars:
      - name: pt12
        type: shell
        params:
          cmd: TZ='America/Los_Angeles' date "+%I:%M:%S %p %Z"
  # Alaska Time
  - trigger: ":at12"
    replace: "{{at12}}"
    vars:
      - name: at12
        type: shell
        params:
          cmd: TZ='America/Anchorage' date "+%I:%M:%S %p %Z"
  # Hawaii-Aleutian Time
  - trigger: ":hat12"
    replace: "{{hat12}}"
    vars:
      - name: hat12
        type: shell
        params:
          cmd: TZ='America/Adak' date "+%I:%M:%S %p %Z"
  # 24-HOUR FORMAT ##########################################
  # Eastern Time
  - trigger: ":et24"
    replace: "{{et24}}"
    vars:
      - name: et24
        type: shell
        params:
          cmd: TZ='America/New_York' date "+%H:%M:%S %Z"
   # Central Time
  - trigger: ":ct24"
    replace: "{{ct24}}"
    vars:
      - name: ct24
        type: shell
        params:
          cmd: TZ='America/Chicago' date "+%H:%M:%S %Z" 
  # Mountain Time
  - trigger: ":mt24"
    replace: "{{mt24}}"
    vars:
      - name: mt24
        type: shell
        params:
          cmd: TZ='America/Denver' date "+%H:%M:%S %Z"
  # Pacific Time
  - trigger: ":pt24"
    replace: "{{pt24}}"
    vars:
      - name: pt24
        type: shell
        params:
          cmd: TZ='America/Los_Angeles' date "+%H:%M:%S %Z"
  # Alaska Time
  - trigger: ":at24"
    replace: "{{at24}}"
    vars:
      - name: at24
        type: shell
        params:
          cmd: TZ='America/Anchorage' date "+%H:%M:%S %Z"
  # Hawaii-Aleutian Time
  - trigger: ":hat24"
    replace: "{{hat24}}"
    vars:
      - name: hat24
        type: shell
        params:
          cmd: TZ='America/Adak' date "+%H:%M:%S %Z"
